traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Dwarf
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the dwarf ancestry. Dwarves are stout folk who often live underground and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by dwarves. An item with this trait is created and used by dwarves.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

traits.name: Nephilim
traits.text: A creature with this trait has the nephilim versatile heritage. Nephilim are planar scions descended from immortal beings from other planes. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by nephilim.

gear.name: +2 greater striking corrosive wounding sawtooth sabers

modifiers.name: kept in one of his *Vernai shell's* extradimensional spaces

automatic_abilities.name: Tail Trip
automatic_abilities.trigger: A creature within Dronuk's reach uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using
automatic_abilities.effect: Dronuk lashes out at the creature with his tail in an attempt to trip the triggering creature up. Dronuk attempts to Trip the triggering creature.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still calculate damage using Strength.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text: Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Twin
traits.text: These weapons are used as a pair. When you attack with a twin weapon, you add a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to the weapon’s number of damage dice if you have previously attacked with a different weapon of the same type this turn. The weapons must be of the same type, but they don’t need to have the same runes.

ability.name: Mantis's Flurry
ability.text: Dronuk's multiple attack penalty for attacks with his sawtooth sabers is –2 for his second attack, and –4 with his third and any subsequent attacks.

ability.name: Prayer Attack

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

ability.requirement: Dronuk wields a sawtooth saber in each hand
ability.effect: Dronuk attempts to Feint an enemy within 30 feet. If the Feint is successful, Dronuk's next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber in that same turn deals 2d6 persistent bleed damage to the target. In addition, provided they remain visible to that target and that target remains within 30 feet of Dronuk, additional Prayer Attacks against that target automatically cause them to become off-guard against Dronuk's attacks until the end of their turn.

ability.name: You're Next

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature’s emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Fear
traits.text: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target’s mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Visual
traits.text: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.

ability.trigger: Dronuk reduces an enemy to 0 Hit Points
ability.effect: Dronuk attempts to Demoralize a single creature he can see. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.
